meanings.definition: The quality or state of being diffuse.
meanings.sent1: The diffusenesses of the fog made it hard to see far ahead.
meanings.sent2: The diffusenesses of her speech made it difficult to understand her point.
meanings.sent3: The diffusenesses of the paint job made the room look like a messy art project.
meanings.sent4: The diffusenesses of emotions in the room created a tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The diffusenesses of the scent lingered in the air long after the flowers were removed.

meanings.definition: The act of spreading widely or thinly.
meanings.sent1: The diffusenesses of the ink on the paper created a blurry effect.
meanings.sent2: The diffusenesses of the rumors spread quickly throughout the town.
meanings.sent3: The diffusenesses of the icing on the cake made it look like a messy masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The diffusenesses of the music filled the entire hall with a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: The diffusenesses of the light from the lamp illuminated the entire room softly.
